entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
